profile:
WEIR TREE SERVICE, -We are Friendly & Professional Tree Service.  We will personally provide you an estimate with various options. Our objective is to be able to provide great quality of service at an affordable price.
Established in 2005,  with over of 10 years of experience our services include tree pruning with various methods depending on the desired result. Careful tree removal, we trim hedges, grind stumps if required. We also offer replacement planting. We treat our clients property like it was our own. 

Our services include Tree & Stump Removal, Pruning, Hedge trimming, Planting and Deep Root Fertilizing. 
We service areas including but limited to brampton, etobicoke, mississauga,milton,oakville,burlington,halton hills,georgetown,vaughn ,woodbridge and toronto  

Feel free to call us for a free estimate you can reach James at 4166175804

profile:
TS Arborist Services is owned and operated by Tom Steckle, an expert arborist offering his professional services in the GTA and surrounding area for over 10 years. The TS Arborist Team approaches each site with experience, knowledge, skill and all equipment required.
We are a full-service tree care company servicing the GTA. Our group is comprised of Ontario trade qualified, and ISA certified arborists with a collective of in-field experience and education of greater than 30 years. 
We specialize in ...
 
•Arborist reports
•technically difficult and hazard tree removal.
•expert pruning
•preservation techniques
•stump removal
•tree planting
•mulching and fertilizing

profile: The Real Tree Masters Inc. tree specialists is an arborist company located in Mississauga, Ontario. profile:
About Me: Trevor Warnaar
 
My wife and I moved to Bolton, ON in 2018 and immediately fell in love with the town. I have worked landscaping jobs all my life and always enjoyed the outdoors. 
 
I completed my formal education as an engineer and soon realized I am not meant to work at a desk! I decide in 2020 to combine my engineering and landscaping skills by opening TreeSide Arborist Services Inc. 
 
​The community of Bolton and the surrounding areas have been wonderful to work with. I pride myself on professionalism, fair pricing and amazing service. 
 
Thank you for your business and for welcoming me to the community!
​ 
- Trevor
